Name: Base Station License, Skyline Car and Limousine Service
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Skyline Car & Limousine Service, Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of The Bronx.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Skyline Car & Limousine Service, Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 3853 Bronxwood Avenue in the borough of The Bronx is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#930
